document.masterDocTitle: New genera, species and records of Maeridae from Australian Waters: Austromaera, Ceradocus, Glossomaera, Hamimaera, Huonella gen. nov., Linguimaera and Maeraceterus gen. nov. (Crustacea: Amphipoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New genera, species and records of Maeridae from Australian Waters: Austromaera, Ceradocus, Glossomaera, Hamimaera, Huonella gen. nov., Linguimaera and Maeraceterus gen. nov. (Crustacea: Amphipoda)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
Western Australia
: 6 specimens , AM P.79458, Bramble Point , Princess Royal Harbour ( 35°02'S 117°55'E ),
1 m
, seagrass
Posidonia australis
, diver-held corer,
January 1988
, coll. P.A. Hutchings et al. (Site 4)
;
2 specimens , P.79459, Bramble Point , Princess Royal Harbour ( 35°2'S 117°55'E ),
1 m
, seagrass
Poisidonia australis
,
January 1988
, coll. P.A. Hutchings et al.
;
1 specimen , AM P.79460, Quaranup Jetty , Princess Royal Harbour , ( 35°03'S 117°55'E ),
1 m
, seagrass
Posidonia sinuosa ,
January 1988
, coll. P.A. Hutchings et al.
;
31 specimens , AM P.79419, near Mistaken Island , Vancouver Peninsula , King George Sound ( 35°4'S 117°56'E ),
6 m
, sea grass,
13 December 1983
, coll. R.T. Springthorpe (WA 121).

New South Wales
: 1 specimen , AM P.85535, south-west side of Boondelbah Island , east of Port Stephens ( 32°42'30"S 152°13'32"E ),
20 m
, under stones airlift on SCUBA ,
10 March 2006
, coll. R.T. Springthorpe (MI
NSW 2914
)
.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality.
Port Jackson ,
New South Wales
, Australia (approx. 33°50.9'S 151°16.2'E ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks. This is the first record of
A. mastersii
from along the Western Australian coast.

Distribution.
Western Australia
: Princess Royal Harbour, King George Sound (current study).
New South Wales
: Bottle and Glass Rocks and Wy-ar-gine Point, Port Jackson; Marys Rock, Cook Island ( Haswell 1879a ; Lowry & Springthorpe 2005 ; current study).
